text: Americo L. Santiago (born July 4, 1951) is an American politician. Santiago lived in Bridgeport, Connecticut. He served in the Connecticut House of Representatives from 1989 to 1995 and was a Democrat.Connecticut State Library-Connecticut General Assembly members database His son Ezequiel Santiago also served in the Connecticut General Assembly.'Bridgeport state Rep. Ezequiel Santiago, 45, dies suddenly,' The Hartford Courant, Russell Blair, March 1, 2019 ==Notes== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Bridgeport, Connecticut Category:Connecticut Democrats Category:Members of the Connecticut House of Representatives
title: Americo Santiago
